thread.title: Luxoft Holding, Inc. to Participate in Investor Conferences During the Month of September
thread.title_full: Luxoft Holding, Inc. to Participate in Investor Conferences During the Month of September

author: admin
title: Luxoft Holding, Inc. to Participate in Investor Conferences During the Month of September
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Luxoft Holding, Inc 
NEW YORK -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Luxoft Holding, Inc (NYSE:LXFT), a leading provider of software development services and innovative IT solutions to a global client base today announced that it will be participating in the following investor conferences during the month of September: 
Dmitry Loschinin, Chief Executive Officer, Maik Lankau, Head of Business Development for Telecommunications, and Alina Plaia, Vice President and Investor Relations Officer, will be presenting and conducting one on one meetings at the Citi 2015 Global Technology Conference on Wednesday, September 9th, 2015 . The Company’s presentation is scheduled to take place on at 11:45 AM EDT . A webcast of the presentation can be found at http://www.veracast.com/webcasts/citigroup/technology2015/44206744918.cfm . Webcast replay will be available 1 hour after conclusion of live event and expires December 9, 2015. 
Roman Trakhtenberg, CEO of Luxoft USA and Alina Plaia, Vice President and Investor Relations Officer, will be conducting one-on-one meetings at the Deutsche Bank Technology Conference on Thursday, September 17 th , 2015 . 
About Luxoft 
Luxoft Holding, Inc. (NYSE:LXFT US) is a leading provider of software development services and innovative IT solutions to a global client base consisting primarily of large multinational corporations. Luxoft’s software development services consist of core and mission critical custom software development and support, product engineering and testing, and technology consulting. Luxoft’s solutions are based on its proprietary products and platforms that directly impact its clients’ business outcomes and efficiently deliver continuous innovation. The Company develops its solutions and delivers its services from 24 dedicated delivery centers worldwide. It has over 9,500 employees across 27 offices in 15 countries in North America, Mexico, Western and Eastern Europe, Asia Pacific, and South Africa. Luxoft is incorporated in Tortola, British Virgin Islands, has its operating headquarters office in Zug, Switzerland and is listed on the New York Stock Exchange. For more information, please visit http://www.luxoft.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150904005669/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
